inclusion.criterion: asthma symptoms on at least two days per week or Beta agonist use on at least two days per week or FEV1 < 85% predicted
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: non-smokers (patients who have never smoked or patients who have not smoked for 1 year and have a total pack-year smoking history < 15 packs)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of oral or inhaled steroid use in the past 4 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of asthma, meets FEV1 criteria, and does not have a history of oral or inhaled steroid use in the past 4 weeks.
